Description: Green glazed composition long, narrow conical bead with moulded spiral decoration.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Register and Diary of D.G. Hogarth's excavations at Asyut, 1907, and Report to the Trustees of the British Museum, all in MSS.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (279)
Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 235)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr David George Hogarth
